鍾.definition: handleless cup; goblet; (bound form) to concentrate (one's affection etc); variant of 鐘|钟[zhong1]

鍾情.definition: to fall in love; to love sb or sth dearly (lover, or art)

鍾愛.definition: to treasure; to be very fond of

鍾睒睒.definition: Zhong Shanshan (1954-), Chinese billionaire businessman, the founder and chairperson of Nongfu Spring 農夫山泉|农夫山泉[Nong2 fu1 Shan1 quan2]

鍾祥.definition: Zhongxiang, county-level city in Jingmen 荊門|荆门[Jing1 men2], Hubei

鍾祥市.definition: Zhongxiang, county-level city in Jingmen 荊門|荆门[Jing1 men2], Hubei

鍾繇.definition: Zhong Yao (151-230), minister of Cao Wei 曹魏[Cao2 Wei4] and noted calligrapher, said to have developed the regular script 楷書|楷书[kai3 shu1]

鍾萬學.definition: Basuki Tjahaja Purnama (1966-), Indonesian politician, governor of Jakarta (2014-)

鍾靈毓秀.definition: (of a place) endowed with a natural beauty that nurtures people of talent (idiom)

鍾馗.definition: Zhong Kui (mythological figure, supposed to drive away evil spirits); (fig.) a person with the courage to fight against evil
